content.rendered:
Directed by James Erskine.

Written by James Erskine. Sandeep Shrivastava. Ajit Bhure. Subodh Khanolkar.

Cast Sachin Tendulkar(Self). Mikail Gandhi(Young Sachin (as Mikhail Gandhi)). Anjali Tendulkar(Self). Mayur More(Ajit Tendulkar). Mayuresh Pem(Nitin Tendulkar). Ramakant Dayma(Ramesh Tendulkar). Madhuri Bandiwdekar(Rajni Tendulkar). Arjun Tendulkar(Self). Sara Tendulkar(Self). Harsha Bhogle(Self). Boria Majumdar(Self). Virender Sehwag(Self). Mahendra Singh Dhoni(Self). Sourav Ganguly(Self). Amitabh Bachchan(Self). Akshay Bhagat(Bookie). Virat Kohli(Self). Viv Richards(Self). Ricky Ponting(Self). Harbhajan Singh(Self). Gary Kirsten(Self). Sunil Gavaskar(Self). Yuvraj Singh(Self). Nasser Hussain(Self). Wasim Akram(Self). Shantanu Shrikant Bhake(Student 2 (as Shantanu Bhake)). Pranav D. Chavan(Student 1). Aman Sharma(Fan). Ajit Tendulkar(Self). Nitin Tendulkar(Self). Rajni Tendulkar(Self). Ramesh Tendulkar(Self). Shane Warne(Self)

Languages Hindi. Marathi. English.

Producers Ravi Bhagchandka. Ravi Bhagchandka. Shrikant Bhasi. Vinay Chaukar. Sanjay Mehta. Sanjay Mehta. Mehjabeen Raja. Rachel Ramsay. Sudipto Sarkar. Sushanto Sarkar. Vaishali Sarwankar. Yogiraj Shetty. Sachin Tendulkar.

Production 200 Not Ou. Carnival Motion Picture.
